00030 Imc::Imc()
00031    : _write_every(0), _do_blocks(false), _do_imc(false), _processed_some_frames(false)
00032 {
00033 }

00035 Imc::~Imc()
00036 {

00038 
00039 // begin the coarse graining process
00040 // here the data structures are prepared to handle all the data
00041 void Imc::Initialize()
00042 {
00043     // do some output
00044     if(_do_imc)
00045             cout << "begin to calculate inverse monte carlo parameters\n";
00046     else
00047             cout << "begin to calculate distribution functions\n";
00048     cout << "# of bonded interactions: " << _bonded.size() << endl;
00049     cout << "# of non-bonded interactions: " << _nonbonded.size() << endl;
00050 
00051     if ( _bonded.size()+_nonbonded.size() == 0 )
00052             throw std::runtime_error("No interactions defined in options xml-file - nothing to be done");
00053 
00054     
00055    // initialize non-bonded structures
00056    for (list<Property*>::iterator iter = _nonbonded.begin();
00057             iter != _nonbonded.end(); ++iter) {
00058         interaction_t *i = AddInteraction(*iter);
00059         i->_is_bonded = false;
00060     }
00061 
00062     // initialize non-bonded structures
00063    for (list<Property*>::iterator iter = _bonded.begin();
00064         iter != _bonded.end(); ++iter) {
00065             interaction_t *i = AddInteraction(*iter);
00066             i->_is_bonded = true;
00067    }
00068    
00069    // initialize the group structures
00070     if(_do_imc)
00071         InitializeGroups();
00072 };
00073 
00074 void Imc::BeginEvaluate(Topology *top, Topology *top_atom)
00075 {
00076   // we didn't process any frames so far
00077     _nframes = 0;
00078     _nblock = 0;
00079     _processed_some_frames=false;
00080 
00081     // initialize non-bonded structures
00082    for (list<Property*>::iterator iter = _nonbonded.begin();
00083             iter != _nonbonded.end(); ++iter) {
00084         string name = (*iter)->get("name").value();
00085 
00086         interaction_t &i = *_interactions[name];
00087 
00088         // generate the bead lists
00089         BeadList beads1, beads2;
00090 
00091         beads1.Generate(*top, (*iter)->get("type1").value());
00092         beads2.Generate(*top, (*iter)->get("type2").value());
00093 
00094         if(beads1.size() == 0)
00095             throw std::runtime_error("Topology does not have beads of type \"" + (*iter)->get("type1").value() + "\"\n"
00096                     "This was specified in type1 of interaction \"" + name+ "\"");
00097         if(beads2.size() == 0)
00098             throw std::runtime_error("Topology does not have beads of type \"" + (*iter)->get("type2").value() + "\"\n"
00099                     "This was specified in type2 of interaction \"" + name + "\"");
00100         // calculate normalization factor for rdf
00101 
00102         if ((*iter)->get("type1").value() == (*iter)->get("type2").value())
00103             i._norm = 1. / (4. * M_PI * i._step * beads1.size()*(beads2.size() - 1.) / 2.);
00104         else
00105             i._norm = 1. / (4. * M_PI * i._step * beads1.size() * beads2.size());
00106     }
00107 }
00108 
00109 // create an entry for interactions
00110 Imc::interaction_t *Imc::AddInteraction(Property *p)
00111 {
00112     string name = p->get("name").value();
00113     string group;
00114     if(_do_imc)
00115         group = p->get("inverse.imc.group").value();
00116     else
00117         group = "none";
00118     
00119     interaction_t *i = new interaction_t;
00120     i->_index = _interactions.size();
00121     _interactions[name] = i;
00122     getGroup(group)->_interactions.push_back(i);
00123     
00124     i->_step = p->get("step").as<double>();
00125     i->_min = p->get("min").as<double>();
00126     i->_max = p->get("max").as<double>();
00127     i->_norm = 1.0;
00128     i->_p=p;
00129     
00130     // initialize the current and average histogram
00131     int n = (int)((i->_max - i->_min) / i->_step + 1.000000001);
00132 
00133     i->_average.Initialize(i->_min, i->_max+i->_step, n);
00134     
00135     return i;
00136 }
00137 
00138 // end of trajectory, post processing data
00139 void Imc::EndEvaluate()
00140 {
00141     if(_nframes > 0) {
00142         if(!_do_blocks) {
00143             WriteDist();
00144             if(_do_imc)
00145                 WriteIMCData();
00146         }
00147     }
00148     // clear interactions and groups
00149     _interactions.clear();
00150     _groups.clear();
00151     if(!_processed_some_frames)
00152         throw std::runtime_error("no frames were processed. Please check your input");
00153 }

00155 // load options from xml file
00156 void Imc::LoadOptions(const string &file) {
00157     load_property_from_xml(_options, file);
00158     _bonded = _options.Select("cg.bonded");
00159     _nonbonded = _options.Select("cg.non-bonded");
00160         
00161 }

00163 // evaluate current conformation
00164 void Imc::Worker::EvalConfiguration(Topology *top, Topology *top_atom) {
00165     
00166     _cur_vol = top->BoxVolume();
00167     // process non-bonded interactions
00168     DoNonbonded(top);
00169     // process bonded interactions
00170     DoBonded(top);            
00171 }
00172 
00173 void Imc::ClearAverages()
00174 {
00175     map<string, interaction_t *>::iterator ic_iter;
00176     map<string, group_t *>::iterator group_iter;
00177     
00178     _nframes = 0;
00179     for (ic_iter = _interactions.begin(); ic_iter != _interactions.end(); ++ic_iter)
00180         ic_iter->second->_average.Clear();    
00181     
00182     for (group_iter = _groups.begin(); group_iter != _groups.end(); ++group_iter)
00183         group_iter->second->_corr.clear();      
00184 }

00186 class IMCNBSearchHandler {
00187 public:
00188     IMCNBSearchHandler(HistogramNew *hist)
00189             : _hist(hist) {}
00190 
00191     HistogramNew *_hist;
00192 
00193     bool FoundPair(Bead *b1, Bead *b2, const vec &r) {
00194         _hist->Process(abs(r));
00195         return false;
00196     }
00197 };

00200 // process non-bonded interactions for current frame
00201 void Imc::Worker::DoNonbonded(Topology *top)
00202 {
00203     for (list<Property*>::iterator iter = _imc->_nonbonded.begin();
00204             iter != _imc->_nonbonded.end(); ++iter) {
00205         string name = (*iter)->get("name").value();
00206         
00207         interaction_t &i = *_imc->_interactions[name];
00208         
00209         // generate the bead lists
00210         BeadList beads1, beads2;
00211         
00212         beads1.Generate(*top, (*iter)->get("type1").value());
00213         beads2.Generate(*top, (*iter)->get("type2").value());
00214                
00215         // generate the neighbour list
00216         NBList *nb;
00217 
00218         bool gridsearch=true;
00219 
00220         if(_imc->_options.exists("cg.nbsearch")) {
00221             if(_imc->_options.get("cg.nbsearch").as<string>() == "grid")
00222                 gridsearch=true;
00223             else if(_imc->_options.get("cg.nbsearch").as<string>() == "simple")
00224                 gridsearch=false;
00225             else throw std::runtime_error("cg.nbsearch invalid, can be grid or simple");
00226         }
00227         if(gridsearch)
00228             nb = new NBListGrid();
00229         else
00230             nb = new NBList();
00231 
00232         nb->setCutoff(i._max + i._step);
00233                 
00234         // clear the current histogram
00235         _current_hists[i._index].Clear();
00236 
00237         IMCNBSearchHandler h(&(_current_hists[i._index]));
00238 
00239         nb->SetMatchFunction(&h, &IMCNBSearchHandler::FoundPair);
00240 
00241         // is it same types or different types?
00242         if((*iter)->get("type1").value() == (*iter)->get("type2").value())
00243             nb->Generate(beads1);
00244         else
00245             nb->Generate(beads1, beads2);
00246 
00247         // process all pairs
00248         /*NBList::iterator pair_iter;
00249         for(pair_iter = nb->begin(); pair_iter!=nb->end();++pair_iter) {
00250                 _current_hists[i._index].Process((*pair_iter)->dist());
00251         }*/
00252 
00253         delete nb;
00254     }    
00255 }
00256 
00257 // process non-bonded interactions for current frame
00258 void Imc::Worker::DoBonded(Topology *top)
00259 {
00260     for (list<Property*>::iterator iter = _imc->_bonded.begin();
00261             iter != _imc->_bonded.end(); ++iter) {
00262         string name = (*iter)->get("name").value();
00263         
00264         interaction_t &i = *_imc->_interactions[name];
00265 
00266         // clear the current histogram
00267         _current_hists[i._index].Clear();
00268 
00269         // now fill with new data
00270         std::list<Interaction *> list = top->InteractionsInGroup(name);
00271 
00272         std::list<Interaction *>::iterator ic_iter;
00273         for(ic_iter=list.begin(); ic_iter!=list.end(); ++ic_iter) {
00274             Interaction *ic = *ic_iter;
00275             double v = ic->EvaluateVar(*top);
00276             _current_hists[i._index].Process(v);
00277         }
00278     }    
00279 }
00280 
00281 // returns a group, creates it if doesn't exist
00282 Imc::group_t *Imc::getGroup(const string &name)
00283 {
00284     map<string, group_t *>::iterator iter;
00285     iter = _groups.find(name);
00286     if(iter == _groups.end()) {
00287         return _groups[name] = new group_t;
00288     }
00289     return (*iter).second;
00290 }
00291 
00292 // initialize the groups after interactions are added
00293 void Imc::InitializeGroups()
00294 {
00295     if(!_do_imc) return;
00296     map<string, group_t *>::iterator group_iter;
00297 
00298     // clear all the pairs
00299     
00300     // iterator over all groups
00301     for (group_iter = _groups.begin(); group_iter != _groups.end(); ++group_iter) {
00302         group_t *grp = (*group_iter).second;      
00303         grp->_pairs.clear();
00304     
00305         int n = 0;
00306         // count number of bins needed in matrix
00307         for (list<interaction_t*>::iterator i1 = grp->_interactions.begin();
00308                 i1 != grp->_interactions.end(); ++i1)
00309             n+=(*i1)->_average.getNBins();
00310     
00311         // handy access to matrix
00312         group_matrix &M = grp->_corr;
00313         
00314         // initialize matrix with zeroes
00315         M.resize(n,n);
00316         M = ub::zero_matrix<double>(n, n);
00317         
00318         // now create references to the sub matrices
00319         int i, j;
00320         i=0;j=0;
00321         // iterate over all possible compinations of pairs
00322         for (list<interaction_t*>::iterator i1 = grp->_interactions.begin();
00323                 i1 != grp->_interactions.end(); ++i1) {
00324             int n1 = (*i1)->_average.getNBins();
00325             j = i;
00326             for (list<interaction_t*>::iterator i2 = i1;
00327                     i2 != grp->_interactions.end(); ++i2) {
00328                 int n2 = (*i2)->_average.getNBins();
00329                 
00330                 // create matrix proxy with sub-matrix
00331                 pair_matrix corr(M, ub::range(i, i+n1), ub::range(j, j+n2));
00332                 // add the pair
00333                 grp->_pairs.push_back(pair_t(*i1, *i2, i, j, corr));
00334                 j+=n2;
00335             }
00336             i+=n1;
00337         }
00338     }
00339 }
00340 
00341 // update the correlation matrix
00342 void Imc::DoCorrelations(Imc::Worker *worker) {
00343     if(!_do_imc) return;
00344     vector<pair_t>::iterator pair;
00345     map<string, group_t *>::iterator group_iter;
00346         
00347      for (group_iter = _groups.begin(); group_iter != _groups.end(); ++group_iter) {
00348         group_t *grp = (*group_iter).second;      
00349         // update correlation for all pairs
00350         for (pair = grp->_pairs.begin(); pair != grp->_pairs.end(); ++pair) {
00351             ub::vector<double> &a = worker->_current_hists[pair->_i1->_index].data().y();
00352             ub::vector<double> &b = worker->_current_hists[pair->_i2->_index].data().y();
00353             pair_matrix &M = pair->_corr;
00354 
00355             // M_ij += a_i*b_j
00356             //for(int i=0; i<M.size1(); ++i)
00357             //    for(int j=i; j<M.size2(); ++j)
00358             //        M(i,j) = ((((double)_nframes-1.0)*M(i,j)) + (a(i)*b(j)))/(double)_nframes;
00359             M = ((((double)_nframes-1.0)*M) + ub::outer_prod(a, b))/(double)_nframes;
00360         }
00361     }
00362 }
00363 
00364 // write the distribution function
00365 void Imc::WriteDist(const string &suffix)
00366 {
00367     map<string, interaction_t *>::iterator iter;
00368 
00369     // for all interactions
00370     for (iter = _interactions.begin(); iter != _interactions.end(); ++iter) {            
00371         // calculate the rdf
00372         Table &t = iter->second->_average.data();            
00373         Table dist(t);
00374         if(!iter->second->_is_bonded) {
00375             dist.y() = _avg_vol.getAvg()*iter->second->_norm *
00376                 element_div(dist.y(),
00377                     element_prod(dist.x(), dist.x())
00378                 );
00379         }
00380         else {
00381             dist.y() = iter->second->_norm * dist.y();
00382         }
00383         
00384         dist.Save((iter->first) + suffix + ".dist.new");
00385         cout << "written " << (iter->first) + suffix + ".dist.new\n";            
00386     }
00387 }
00388 
00389 
00396 void Imc::WriteIMCData(const string &suffix) {            
00397     if(!_do_imc) return;
00398     //map<string, interaction_t *>::iterator ic_iter;
00399     map<string, group_t *>::iterator group_iter;
00400     
00401     // iterate over all groups
00402     for(group_iter = _groups.begin(); group_iter!=_groups.end(); ++group_iter) {
00403         group_t *grp = (*group_iter).second;    
00404         string grp_name = (*group_iter).first;
00405         list<interaction_t *>::iterator iter;
00406         
00407         // number of total bins for all interactions in group is matrix dimension
00408         int n=grp->_corr.size1();
00409                 
00410         // build full set of equations + copy some data to make
00411         // code better to read
00412         group_matrix gmc(grp->_corr);
00413         ub::vector<double> dS(n);
00414         ub::vector<double> r(n);
00415         // the next two variables are to later extract the individual parts
00416         // from the whole data after solving equations
00417         vector<RangeParser> ranges; // sizes of the individual interactions
00418         vector<string> names; // names of the interactions
00419                         
00420         // copy all averages+r of group to one vector
00421         n=0;
00422         int begin=1;
00423         for(iter=grp->_interactions.begin(); iter != grp->_interactions.end(); ++iter) {
00424             interaction_t *ic = *iter;
00425             
00426             // sub vector for dS
00427             ub::vector_range< ub::vector<double> > sub_dS(dS, 
00428                     ub::range(n, n + ic->_average.getNBins()));
00429             
00430             // sub vector for r
00431             ub::vector_range< ub::vector<double> > sub_r(r, 
00432                     ub::range(n, n + ic->_average.getNBins()));
00433             
00434             // read in target and calculate dS
00435             CalcDeltaS(ic, sub_dS);
00436             
00437             // copy r
00438             sub_r = ic->_average.data().x();
00439             
00440             // save size
00441 
00442             RangeParser rp;
00443             int end = begin  + ic->_average.getNBins() -1;
00444             rp.Add(begin, end);
00445             ranges.push_back(rp);
00446             begin = end+1;
00447             // save name
00448             names.push_back(ic->_p->get("name").as<string>());
00449             
00450             // shift subrange by size of current
00451             n+=ic->_average.getNBins();
00452         }
00453         
00454         // now we need to calculate the 
00455         // A_ij = <S_i*S_j> - <S_i>*<S_j>        
00456         vector<pair_t>::iterator pair;
00457         for (pair = grp->_pairs.begin(); pair != grp->_pairs.end(); ++pair) {
00458             interaction_t *i1 = pair->_i1;
00459             interaction_t *i2 = pair->_i2;
00460             
00461             // make reference to <S_i>
00462             ub::vector<double> &a = i1->_average.data().y();
00463             // make reference to <S_j>
00464             ub::vector<double> &b = i2->_average.data().y();
00465             
00466             int i=pair->_offset_i;
00467             int j=pair->_offset_j;
00468             int n1=i1->_average.getNBins();
00469             int n2=i2->_average.getNBins();
00470             
00471             // sub matrix for these two interactions
00472             // we only need to take care about one sub-matrix and not the mirrored
00473             // one since ublas makes sure the matrix is symmetric
00474             pair_matrix M(gmc, ub::range(i, i+n1),
00475                                ub::range(j, j+n2));
00476             // A_ij = -(<a_i*a_j>  - <a_i>*<b_j>)
00477             //for(i=0; i<M.size1(); ++i)
00478             //    for(j=i; j<M.size2(); ++j)
00479             //        M(i,j) = -(M(i,j) - a(i)*b(j));
00480             M = -(M - ub::outer_prod(a, b));
00481         }
00482         
00483         imcio_write_dS(grp_name + suffix + ".imc", r, dS);
00484         imcio_write_matrix(grp_name + suffix + ".gmc", gmc);
00485         imcio_write_index(grp_name + suffix + ".idx", names, ranges);
00486 
00487     }
00488 }
00489 
00490 // calculate deviation from target vectors
00491 void Imc::CalcDeltaS(interaction_t *interaction, ub::vector_range< ub::vector<double> > &dS)
00492 {
00493     const string &name = interaction->_p->get("name").as<string>();
00494                 
00495     Table target;
00496     target.Load(name + ".dist.tgt");
00497                       
00498     if(!interaction->_is_bonded) {
00499         target.y() = (1.0 / (_avg_vol.getAvg()*interaction->_norm))*ub::element_prod(target.y(),
00500             (ub::element_prod(target.x(), target.x()))
00501             ) ;
00502     }
00503     else {
00504             target.y() = (1.0 / interaction->_norm)*target.y();
00505     }
00506     if(target.y().size() !=  interaction->_average.data().y().size())
00507         throw std::runtime_error("number of grid points in target does not match the grid");
00508 
00509     dS = interaction->_average.data().y() - target.y();
00510 }

00513 void Imc::WriteIMCBlock(const string &suffix)
00514 {
00515     if(!_do_imc) return;
00516     //map<string, interaction_t *>::iterator ic_iter;
00517     map<string, group_t *>::iterator group_iter;
00518 
00519     // iterate over all groups
00520     for(group_iter = _groups.begin(); group_iter!=_groups.end(); ++group_iter) {
00521         group_t *grp = (*group_iter).second;
00522         string grp_name = (*group_iter).first;
00523         list<interaction_t *>::iterator iter;
00524 
00525         // number of total bins for all interactions in group is matrix dimension
00526         int n=grp->_corr.size1();
00527 
00528         // build full set of equations + copy some data to make
00529         // code better to read
00530         group_matrix gmc(grp->_corr);
00531         ub::vector<double> dS(n);
00532         ub::vector<double> r(n);
00533         // the next two variables are to later extract the individual parts
00534         // from the whole data after solving equations
00535         vector<int> sizes; // sizes of the individual interactions
00536         vector<string> names; // names of the interactions
00537 
00538         // copy all averages+r of group to one vector
00539         n=0;
00540         for(iter=grp->_interactions.begin(); iter != grp->_interactions.end(); ++iter) {
00541             interaction_t *ic = *iter;
00542 
00543             // sub vector for dS
00544             ub::vector_range< ub::vector<double> > sub_dS(dS,
00545                     ub::range(n, n + ic->_average.getNBins()));
00546 
00547             // sub vector for r
00548             ub::vector_range< ub::vector<double> > sub_r(r,
00549                     ub::range(n, n + ic->_average.getNBins()));
00550 
00551             // read in target and calculate dS
00552             sub_dS = ic->_average.data().y();
00553             // copy r
00554             sub_r = ic->_average.data().x();
00555             // save size
00556             sizes.push_back(ic->_average.getNBins());
00557             // save name
00558             names.push_back(ic->_p->get("name").as<string>());
00559 
00560             // shift subrange by size of current
00561             n+=ic->_average.getNBins();
00562         }
00563 
00564         // write the dS
00565         ofstream out_dS;
00566         string name_dS = grp_name + suffix + ".S";
00567         out_dS.open(name_dS.c_str());
00568         out_dS << setprecision(8);
00569         if(!out_dS)
00570             throw runtime_error(string("error, cannot open file ") + name_dS);
00571 
00572         for(size_t i=0; i<dS.size(); ++i) {
00573             out_dS << r[i] << " " << dS[i] << endl;
00574         }
00575 
00576         out_dS.close();
00577         cout << "written " << name_dS << endl;
00578 
00579         // write the correlations
00580         ofstream out_cor;
00581         string name_cor = grp_name + suffix + ".cor";
00582         out_cor.open(name_cor.c_str());
00583         out_cor << setprecision(8);
00584 
00585         if(!out_cor)
00586             throw runtime_error(string("error, cannot open file ") + name_cor);
00587 
00588         for(group_matrix::size_type i=0; i<grp->_corr.size1(); ++i) {
00589             for(group_matrix::size_type j=0; j<grp->_corr.size2(); ++j) {
00590                 out_cor << grp->_corr(i, j) << " ";
00591             }
00592             out_cor << endl;
00593         }
00594         out_cor.close();
00595         cout << "written " << name_cor << endl;
00596     }
00597 }
00598 
00599 CsgApplication::Worker *Imc::ForkWorker()
00600 {
00601     Imc::Worker *worker;
00602     worker = new Imc::Worker;
00603     map<string, interaction_t *>::iterator ic_iter;
00604 
00605     worker->_current_hists.resize(_interactions.size());
00606     worker->_imc = this;
00607 
00608     for (ic_iter = _interactions.begin(); ic_iter != _interactions.end(); ++ic_iter) {
00609         interaction_t *i = ic_iter->second;
00610         worker->_current_hists[i->_index].Initialize(
00611         i->_average.getMin(),
00612         i->_average.getMax(),
00613         i->_average.getNBins());
00614     }
00615     return worker;
00616 }
00617 
00618 void Imc::MergeWorker(CsgApplication::Worker* worker_)
00619 {
00620     _processed_some_frames = true;
00621     Imc::Worker *worker = dynamic_cast<Imc::Worker *>(worker_);
00622         // update the average
00623     map<string, interaction_t *>::iterator ic_iter;
00624     //map<string, group_t *>::iterator group_iter;
00625 
00626     ++_nframes;
00627     _avg_vol.Process(worker->_cur_vol);
00628     for (ic_iter = _interactions.begin(); ic_iter != _interactions.end(); ++ic_iter) {
00629         interaction_t *i=ic_iter->second;
00630         i->_average.data().y() = (((double)_nframes-1.0)*i->_average.data().y()
00631             + worker->_current_hists[i->_index].data().y())/(double)_nframes;
00632     }
00633 
00634         // update correlation matrices
00635     if(_do_imc)
00636         DoCorrelations(worker);
00637 
00638     if(_write_every != 0) {
00639         if((_nframes % _write_every)==0) {
00640             _nblock++;
00641             string suffix = string("_") + boost::lexical_cast<string>(_nblock);
00642             WriteDist(suffix);
00643             WriteIMCData(suffix);
00644             WriteIMCBlock(suffix);
00645             if(_do_blocks)
00646                 ClearAverages();
00647         }
00648     }
00649 
00650 }
00651 
00652 }}
